title: 'Eddie And The Stolen Purse' Saga + Bobby’s Girlfriend Practiced Being A Mom + Rejected Segments!
itunes:title: 'Eddie And The Stolen Purse' Saga + Bobby’s Girlfriend Practiced Being A Mom + Rejected Segments!
description:
Eddie found a purse in the dumpster after the show yesterday and was able to get it back to the owner who saw him posting about it on Instagram. We talk to her on the phone and figure out what happened. Bobby’s girlfriend Caitlin picked up Amy’s kids from school yesterday and was perplexed by the process. Plus, Bobby reads back rejected segment ideas that the show members suggested!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
